meanings.definition: Incapable of being estimated or assessed.
meanings.sent1: The value of friendship is inestimably important.
meanings.sent2: Her kindness was inestimably valuable to those in need.
meanings.sent3: The cat's inestimably lazy behavior made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The impact of his words was inestimably powerful.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was inestimably breathtaking.

meanings.definition: To an exceedingly great extent or degree.
meanings.sent2: The team inestimably improved their performance.
meanings.sent3: He inestimably danced around the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The music inestimably lifted their spirits.
meanings.sent5: The flowers inestimably bloomed in the spring.
